subject: I sent George (C2C) an email =11/29
author: judy_in_hollywood
full_text: Hi all, I sent George an email about our group here (to look in) + about the RS 12-469 AM/FM digital radio modification - for his awareness! Hope he gets it & READS it.    =Judy=   P.S.  On Friday's anyone can call in (IF ya can get thru) to his show and discuse anything, even the RS Hack! IDEA?  Let everyone out there know about it = free advertising!  LOL   FRANK, call in!!!
